contentHtml:
Write a programme to convert feet to inches

Input  : 1
Output : 12

#include <stdio.h>

int main(void)
{
    int feet;
    printf("Input  : ");
    scanf("%d", &feet);
    printf("Output : %d\n", feet * 12);
    return 0;
}

frontMatter.title: Feet to Inches
frontMatter.description: Write a programme to convert feet to inches
